heading: Clarify
text: Ask the users of the product questions to observe how all user needs can be met.

heading: Ideate
text: Come up with fresh ideas to add to the existing design to improve it for user appreciation.

heading: Develop
text: Create a model design (prototype) to ensure that the product is durable and effective.

heading: Implement
text: Apply the important aspects of communication to make sure that all people involved in the sales process are aware of the way forward.
